name: EdiSmart
0:
”Alexa, start Edimax.”
”Alexa, ask Edimax turn on the bedroom light.”
”Alexa, ask Edimax turn off the bedroom light.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: edimax
des:
The Edimax smart skill works with Edimax smart plug and more Edimax IoT devices.
You can now enjoy voice control of your lights and appliances without ever tapping your phone.

Getting Started:
1. To get started, select the "Enable Skills" button in Alexa app to link your Edimax account.
2. Specify a nickname for each device (defined in the EdiSmart app).
For more information, please visit: https://www.edimax.com/app/edismart/start.html
3. Connect devices: Once specified, you can voice-control the device via Alexa Voice Service with some examples below:
“Alexa, ask Edimax turn on the bedroom light” or “Alexa, ask Edimax turn off the bedroom light”.
Please note here, "the bedroom light" is the full device name you named in Edismart app.
For more information about Edimax Smart devices, please visit: http://www.edimax.com/edimax/merchandise/merchandise_list/data/edimax/global/home_automation.
